tool.name: Seasons RDA
tool.description: Perform constrained distance-based redundancy analysis (dbRDA) for the factor seasons on the data from the MTBLS520 study
tool.help:
========================= Eco-Metabolomics workflow =========================
This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes.
Module | Seasons dbRDA |
Description | Perform constrained distance-based redundancy analysis (dbRDA) for the factor seasons on the data |
----- Input -----
Input Rdata | Rdata file |
------ Output ------
Seasons dbRDA summary | Text summary |
Seasons dbRDA | PDF plot |
---------------------------------------------------
.. class:: infomark
**Authors**
For updates and documentation, please visit **https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520** or contact **Kristian Peters (kpeters@ipb-halle.de)**.
